name: Eco Radiance Cream
description: A lightweight moisturizer infused with organic botanicals to enhance your skin's natural glow while protecting the environment.

name: Nature's Hydration Balm
description: Deeply hydrating balm made from sustainably sourced ingredients, perfect for dry skin and eco-conscious consumers.

name: Green Tea Revitalizing Cream
description: Enriched with green tea extract, this cream revitalizes tired skin while promoting a healthier planet.

name: Botanical Bliss Night Cream
description: A rich night cream that nourishes your skin with a blend of botanical extracts, ensuring you wake up refreshed and radiant.

name: Citrus Fresh Face Gel
description: A refreshing gel that combines citrus extracts and aloe vera for a burst of hydration and a zesty scent, all while being kind to the earth.

name: Almond & Honey Nourishing Cream
description: This nourishing cream blends almond oil and honey for a luxurious feel, promoting soft, supple skin with eco-friendly ingredients.

name: Herbal Essence Repair Cream
description: A repairing cream packed with herbal essences that work to restore and rejuvenate your skin while supporting sustainable practices.

name: Ocean Breeze SPF Lotion
description: Protect your skin with this lightweight SPF lotion that harnesses the power of ocean-derived ingredients, perfect for eco-conscious sun lovers.

name: Lavender Calm Cream
description: Infused with calming lavender, this cream soothes irritated skin and promotes relaxation, all while being gentle on the planet.

name: Wildflower Glow Serum
description: A luxurious serum that captures the essence of wildflowers, providing a radiant finish while supporting biodiversity and eco-friendly farming.
